com.thinkaurelius.titan.core

Interface TypeMaker

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KeyMaker, LabelMaker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardKeyMaker, StandardLabelMaker

    public interface TypeMaker
    TypeMaker is a factory for TitanTypes. TitanTypes can be configured to provide data verification, better storage efficiency, and higher performance. The TitanType defines the schema for all TitanRelations of that type.

    All user defined types are configured using a TypeMaker instance returned by TitanTransaction.makeKey(String)} or TitanTransaction.makeLabel(String) where the string parameter is the name of the type to be created. Hence, types are defined within the context of a transaction like every other object in a TitanGraph. The configuration options available when defining a type depend on whether its a key or a label. See KeyMaker and LabelMaker for more details.
    Author:
    Matthias Bröcheler (http://www.matthiasb.com)
    See Also:
    TitanType, Titan Type Wiki

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TypeMaker.UniquenessConsistency
      Consistency imposed against the underlying storage backend as configured in TypeMaker.
